library(tidyverse)

install.packages("here")


library(here)
ca_np <- read_csv(here("data", "ca_np.csv"))

ci_np <- read_excel(here("data", "ci_np.xlsx"))
names(ci_np)
head(ci_np)

ggplot(data= ci_np, aes(x=year, y= visitors)) + geom_line()

gg_base <- ggplot(data= ci_np, aes(x=year, y= visitors))

gg_base + geom_point()

gg_base + geom_col()

gg_base + geom_area()



gg_base + geom_line(color = "purple", linetype = "dashed" )


gg_base + geom_point(color = "purple",pch = 15, size = 4, alpha = 0.6)


gg_base + geom_point(aes(size = visitors, color = visitors), alpha = 0.6)

gg_base + geom_col(aes(fill = visitors))
